en-US.ROCKY_SPEEDWAY_DESC: Soar through these ancient and monumental valleys to achieve blistering speeds in your Sodium2 craft!
en-US.INDUSTRIAL_SECTOR_DESC: This track was constructed over the roads that once led in and out of the long abandoned tunnels and refineries of a former mining settlement.
en-US.ROCKY_SPEEDWAY_REV_DESC: Soar through these ancient and monumental valleys to achieve blistering speeds in your Sodium2 craft! This course takes a reverse route through the track.
en-US.INDUSTRIAL_SECTOR_REV_DESC: This track was constructed over the roads that once led in and out of the long abandoned tunnels and refineries of a former mining settlement. This course takes a reverse route through the track.
en-US.TweakDialog_Depleted_item: You have run out of mounted Rocket Boosters. Tweak vehicle?
en-US.TweakDialog_New_item: You have new equipment in your garage.
en-US.VictoryTaunt_NpBody1: Did you confuse your air brakes and the accelerator again? Listen carefully, Sodium2, #track#, bring your game face, class is in session. \n\nThis message was sent by a friend from the game Sodium2 by Lockwood Publishing. Lockwood will not store your Online ID.
en-US.VictoryTaunt_NpBody2: Vrooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooom!!! Whoosh!! BOOM!! If you’re hearing that, I think my racer just buzzed you on #track#. Sodium2 gauntlet laid down. Do you want to accept? \n\nThis message was sent by a friend from the game Sodium2 by Lockwood Publishing. Lockwood will not store your Online ID.
en-US.VictoryTaunt_NpBody3: Your lap time for #track# has now crumbled under the awesomeness of my skillfully controlled jetcraft! The new time to beat is #time#. Best of luck! You're gonna need it! \n\nThis message was sent by a friend from the game Sodium2 by Lockwood Publishing. Lockwood will not store your Online ID.
en-US.TIP_SURVEY: Leave feedback in our survey to make your mark on the final design of Sodium2!
en-US.TIP_AIRBRAKES: Remember to use your air brakes by pressing [L1] or [R1] when going into a corner. Air brakes are incredibly effective in giving you extra turning capability.
en-US.TIP_UPGRADE: Upgrading your vehicle can provide you with explosive performance. Visit the Sodium2 shop to acquire enhanced components, then equip them in the garage.
en-US.TIP_BOOSTERS: Time your Rocket Boosters carefully. Finding the perfect spots to let them rip will help you shave much coveted seconds off your best time.
en-US.TIP_XP: Chasing that perfect racing line will help you gain higher levels of XP for each race.
en-US.TIP_AEROBATIC_A: Want more control into those sharp bends? Upgrade to the %s aerofoils for extreme manoeuverability.
en-US.TIP_FIRECRACKER_A: Need that extra burst of acceleration? The %s packs an awesome punch to get you out of tight situations.
en-US.TIP_HDCSAL_A: Impress your friends with the %s premium paint scheme. This radical HDC design features go-faster everything!
en-US.TIP_FLIGHT_A: Flight computers provide much needed stability to your Sodium Velocity Racer. Just what you need to counteract the destabilising effects of powerful afterburners.
en-US.TIP_TOUCHSTONE_A: Remember, you can use rocket boosters to propel yourself out of tight bends! These %s boosters provide a versatile solution to such predicaments.
en-US.TIP_BONESHAKER_A: If you're desperate for that extra injection of speed and acceleration then check out our %s afterburners. Just what you need to gain those precious few seconds over your friends.
en-US.TIP_AEROBATIC_B: To find the perfect racing line you need control to hit the sweet spot on every corner. When you need the surgical touch rather than sledgehammer acceleration a set of %s aerofoils will have your jet racer handling like it's on rails.
en-US.TIP_FIRECRACKER_B: Naught to infinity in an eye blink with %s Rocket Boosters, putting the BANG! in explosive acceleration.
en-US.TIP_HDCSAL_B: They may only see a blur overtaking them, but you can't be a champion if you don't look the part. Look 1000 mph even when you're standing still with the %s premium paint scheme. So hot it burns.
en-US.TIP_FLIGHT_B: In Project Velocity you need nerves of steel, and to be ice cold under pressure. A Flight Computer's onboard AI is the steady hand you need to keep control on the ragged edge.
en-US.TIP_TOUCHSTONE_B: Luck favours the prepared mind in Jet racing. Too much torque and they'll be washing you off the wreckage, too much control and they'll think you never left the garage. %s rocket boosters have the versatility you need.
en-US.TIP_BONESHAKER_B: There is no second place, at 1000 mph an eyeblink is the difference between victory or failure. Need an explosion of speed to beat the other guy to the line? %s afterburners, when break neck is the only speed you need.
en-US.TIP_AEROBATIC_C: Show that Sodium Velocity Racer who's boss. %s aerofoils help you maintain control on even the tightest of bends.
en-US.TIP_FIRECRACKER_C: Blast ahead of your friends with %s Rocket Boosters.
en-US.TIP_HDCSAL_C: Beat them in style with the %s premium paint scheme. It's the colour of win!
en-US.TIP_FLIGHT_C: Afterburners made things a little unstable? Let the flight computer handle it while you concentrate on victory.
en-US.TIP_TOUCHSTONE_C: Don't get left behind! Use %s boosters to get out of tight spots.
en-US.TIP_BONESHAKER_C: Need to shave seconds off your time? %s afterburners will give you that race-winning extra speed.
en-US.TIP_AEROBATIC_D: Smooth through corners.\nReduce overtaking possibilties.\nProtect your lead.
en-US.TIP_FIRECRACKER_D: Instant acceleration.\nGain the advantage.\nWin the race.
en-US.TIP_HDCSAL_D: Look awesome.\nBe the envy of your friends.\nLook great during replays.
en-US.TIP_FLIGHT_D: More stability.\nReduce pilot error.\nBecome an expert pilot.
en-US.TIP_TOUCHSTONE_D: Don't get left behind.\nExplosive acceleration.\nSet impressive record times.
en-US.TIP_BONESHAKER_D: Hold your nerve.\nBreak the sound barrier.\nBecome the leader.
en-US.TIP_AEROBATIC_E: Increased control and handling into corners is only for those who are confident in their reflexes. Are you skilled enough to handle the advantage?
en-US.TIP_FIRECRACKER_E: You probably couldn't handle the punchy acceleration of the %s rocket boosters.
en-US.TIP_HDCSAL_E: Are you one to blend in with the crowd?
en-US.TIP_FLIGHT_E: Its not really fair on others to buy a flight computer… but who would know?
en-US.TIP_TOUCHSTONE_E: The safest rocket boosters in Sodium racing. What could possibly go wrong? Nothing. Nothing at all… Nothing.
en-US.TIP_BONESHAKER_E: Can you handle the increased turbulence created by the explosive acceleration of the BONESHAKER rocket boosters? Didn't think so.
en-US.RACE_AGAIN_QUESTION: Would you like to race again?
en-US.LOADOUT_SAVE_CHANGES: Your loadout has changed.\nSave your new loadout?
en-US.OLD_MULTIPLAYER_COMING_SOON: Multiplayer mode will be added soon!\n\nCheck out http://www.sodiumone.com regularly for news and updates.
en-US.MULTIPLAYER_COMING_SOON: This is the Sodium2 multiplayer access point.
en-US.LAUNCH_MULTIPLAYER_QUESTION: Would you like to proceed to the multiplayer area?
en-US.ARCADE_COMING_SOON: Arcade mode will be added soon!\n\nCheck out http://www.sodiumone.com regularly for news and updates.
en-US.ITEM_BOUGHT_SUCCESS: Congratulations! You have successfully bought this item!
en-US.ITEM_BOUGHT_SUCCESS_PLURAL: Congratulations! You have successfully bought these items!
en-US.CONNECTION_MSG: There was a problem connecting to the data server, your progress may not be saved if you choose to continue
en-US.NAME: Name:
en-US.TITLE: Title
en-US.CREATE_CHALLENGE_CHECK: Do you want to create this challenge?
en-US.ENTRY_FEE_DEDUCT_NOTIFY: Your entry fee will be deducted now if you accept.
en-US.PLEASE_RETRY_LATER: Please try again in a moment.
en-US.CHALLENGE_PLAYERS_INVITED: All other players have been invited.
en-US.VIEW_CHALLENGES_IN_INBOX: Go to your inbox to view your challenges.
en-US.VIEW_CHALLENGES_IN_CHALLENGE_INBOX: Go to your challenge inbox to view your challenges.
en-US.CANCEL_CHALLENGE_CHECK: Do you want to cancel this challenge.
en-US.CHALLENGE_SETUP_LOSE_NOTIFY: You will lose this challenge setup if you accept.
en-US.ACCEPT_CHALLENGE_CHECK: Did you want to accept this challenge?
en-US.CHALLENGE_PARTICIPANT_NOTIFY: You are now part of this challenge.
en-US.DECLINE_CHALLENGE_CHECK: Do you want to decline this challenge?
en-US.DECLINE_CHALLENGE_NOTIFY: This challenge will be deleted from your inbox if you accept.
en-US.DECLINE_CHALLENGE_CHECK_AGAIN: Are you sure you want to decline this challenge.
en-US.DECLINE_CHALLENGE_NOTIFY_AGAIN: You will not be able to participate if you accept.
en-US.Name: Name
en-US.DARK_PLANET_REV_DESC: The punishing bends, bridges and tunnels surrounding this mysterious off-world research facility mean that this track is not for the faint of heart. This course takes a reverse route through the track.
en-US.DARK_PLANET_DESC: The punishing bends, bridges and tunnels surrounding this mysterious off-world research facility mean that this track is not for the faint of heart.
en-US.NOT_OWNED_VIEW_SHOP: %s not currently owned. View in shop?
en-US.NOT_OWNED_VIEW_CP: %s not currently owned. View in the Commerce Point?
en-US.NOT_OWNED_PURCHASE: %s not currently owned. Would you like to purchase it?
en-US.NEW_ITEM_DESC_1: Well done pilot! In light of your new promotion, you can now purchase the %s %s from the garage!
en-US.NEW_ITEM_DESC_2: It's your lucky day rookie! You may now purchase the %s %s from the garage!
en-US.NEW_ITEM_DESC_3: Another item has been unlocked! Look out for the %s %s in the garage!
en-US.NEW_ITEM_DESC_4: Congratulations, you’ve unlocked the %s %s in the garage!
en-US.NEW_ITEM_DESC_5: Another XP level reached! You’ve now unlocked the %s %s in the garage.
en-US.NEW_ITEM_DESC_6: Your awesome skills have unlocked the %s %s from the garage. Well done!
en-US.NEW_ITEM_DESC_7: In recognition of your hard work, the %s %s has now been unlocked in the garage for you to purchase.
en-US.NOT_OWNED_PURCHASE_PLURAL: %s not currently owned. Would you like to purchase some?
en-US.CANNOT_MOUNT_NOT_OWNED: You cannot mount the %s to your jetcraft as you do not own it. %s
en-US.PURCHASE_FROM_CP_PLURAL: Would you like to buy some %s %s from the Commerce Point?
en-US.PURCHASE_FROM_CP_SINGULAR: Would you like to buy the %s %s from the Commerce Point?
en-US.PURCHASE_WITH_CREDITS_PLURAL: Would you like to buy some %s %s with your Sodium Credits?
en-US.PURCHASE_WITH_CREDITS_SINGULAR: Would you like to buy the %s %s with your Sodium Credits?
en-US.TERMS_OF_SERVICE_TEXT: Download is subject to the PlayStation Network Terms of Service/User Agreement and any specific additional conditions applying to this item. If you do not wish to accept these terms, do not download this item. Download is licensed or sublicensed to you for use solely within PlayStation Home by the purchasing PSN account. Content may not be used by any other account.
en-US.SESSION_DISCARD_TEXT: Warning: You will lose your session setup!
en-US.PROFANITY_DETECTED: Please do not enter rude words!
en-US.SESSION_PRIVATE: This is a private session, please select another.
en-US.SESSION_FULL: This session is full, please select another.
en-US.SESSION_CLASS_LIMIT_1: You have exceeded the vehicle class limit for this session, please reconfigure your vehicle in the garage.
en-US.SESSION_CLASS_LIMIT_2: Vehicle class ratings about %d stars cannot race in this session, please change your loadout in the garage or select another session.
en-US.SESSION_CREATE_CLASS_EXCEEDED: Your %d star vehicle is too powerful for a %d star session. Please adjust the session or adjust your vehicle in the garage.
en-US.SESSION_LIST_CLASS_EXCEEDED: Your %d star vehicle is too powerful for this %d star session. Please select another session or adjust your vehicle in the garage.
en-US.SESSION_CREATE_CLASS_EXCEEDED_ALT: Your class %d vehicle is too powerful for a class %d session. Please adjust the session or adjust your vehicle in the garage.
en-US.SESSION_LIST_CLASS_EXCEEDED_ALT: Your class %d vehicle is too powerful for this class %d session. Please select another session or adjust your vehicle in the garage.
en-US.SESSION_CREATE_WRONG_CLASS: This is a class %d session and your vehicle is class %d. Please adjust the session class or modify your vehicle loadout in the garage.
en-US.SESSION_LIST_WRONG_CLASS: This is a class %d session and your vehicle is class %d. Please select another session or modify your vehicle loadout in the garage.
en-US.PLAYER_LEVEL_UP_6: %s has levelled up and is now level %d
en-US.SESSION_INGAME: Unable to join this session as a race is in progress. Please try again later or select another session.
en-US.EXIT_LOBBY_QUESTION: Are you sure you want to exit this session?
en-US.MUST_BE_CERTAIN_LEVEL_TO_MOUNT: You must be level %s to mount this item
en-US.MUST_BE_CERTAIN_LEVEL: You must be level %s to purchase this item.
en-US.CONTINUE_WITHOUT_MOUNTING: Do you wish to continue racing without any rocket boosters?
en-US.GARAGE_NOT_AVAILABLE_YET: The garage is not available yet. Come back when you have gained more experience.
en-US.FRIENDS_TAUTNED_BODY: Your friends have just been taunted!
en-US.FRIEND_TAUTNED_BODY: You have just taunted your friend!
en-US.VEHICLE_CLASS_SESSION: This session is for %d star vehicles only.
en-US.LAST_LOADOUT_QUESTION: Would you like to use your last %d star vehicle loadout?
en-US.SESSION_TIMED_OUT_MSG: You have been disconnected from this session due to inactivity.
en-US.SCEEtaunt_disclaimer_title: Please only send messages to friends who will be happy to receive them. Your online ID will be displayed in this message.
en-US.SCEEVictoryTaunt_NpBody1: Did you confuse your air brakes and the accelerator again? Listen carefully, Sodium2, #track#, bring your game face, class is in session.
en-US.SCEEVictoryTaunt_NpBody2: Vrooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooom!!! Whoosh!! BOOM!! If you’re hearing that, I think my racer just buzzed you on #track#. Sodium2 gauntlet laid down. Do you want to accept?
en-US.SCEEVictoryTaunt_NpBody3: Your lap time for #track# has now crumbled under the awesomeness of my skillfully controlled jetcraft! The new time to beat is #time#. Best of luck! You're gonna need it!
en-US.SCEEVictoryTaunt_NpBodyDisclaimer: This message was sent by a friend from the game Sodium2 by Lockwood Publishing. Lockwood will not store your Online ID.
en-US.QUICK_LOADOUT_DESC: Set the loadout of your jetcraft quickly by selecting a class.
en-US.QUICK_LOADOUT_FAIL_DESC: A class #classNum# loadout cannot be created. #nextSentence#
en-US.QUICK_LOADOUT_FAIL_PURCHASE: You do not own any items of this class. Try purchasing a class #classNum# item so this loadout can be generated.
en-US.QUICK_LOADOUT_FAIL_LEVELUP: You do not own any items of this class and there are none available for you to purchase. Try increasing your XP level rookie!
en-US.TRACK_IS_DOWNLOADING_2: Please remain in the Sodium 2 space for the download to complete.
en-US.TRACK_IS_DOWNLOADING_3: A download notification will appear when it is ready.
en-US.MULTI_TRACKS_DOWNLOADING: You cannot access the multiplayer game yet as some tracks are still downloading.
en-US.SESSION_TRACK_DOWNLOADING: This session uses #track_pack_name#, which is currently downloading. Please select another session. #notification#
en-US.PLAYER_FINISHED_RACE_RANK: #player_name# has finished the race in #rank# place!
